column2: "Hom ntutu mbirika ndzi akɔnaaba wɔ Jerusalɛm abrɔn mu
column3: na afei hom nhwɛ
column4: na hom nhu! Hom nhwehwɛ n’abɔntsen do
column5: kyerɛ dɛ hom bohu nyimpa bi
column6: dɛ obi wɔ hɔ a odzi atsɛntsenenee
column7: na ɔhwehwɛ nokwardzi; ama medze aakyɛ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Ɔwɔ mu dɛ wɔka dɛ
column3: Dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi; naaso ntanhun ara na wɔka."

column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column3: aso w’enyi nndzi nokwar ekyir bi a? Ɔwo abobɔ hɔn
column6: naaso wɔapow ntsea: wɔayeyɛ hɔn enyim dzendzenndzen sen ɔbotan

column2: "Nna mesee dɛ
column3: Woyinom yɛ abɔbɔfo ara
column4: wɔyɛ nkwasea; na wonnyim EWURADZE no kwan
column5: anaa hɔn Nyankopɔn ne mbra no."

column2: "Ma monkɔ nyimpa akɛse no nkyɛn
column3: na menkɛkasa nkyerɛ hɔn; osiandɛ wonyim EWURADZE no kwan no
column4: nye hɔn Nyankopɔn ne mbra no. Naaso woyinom nyinara ayɛ kor ebubu kɔndua no

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ogyata fi kwaa mu bokuku hɔn
column3: sar do pataku bɛba abɛsɛɛ hɔn. Ɔsebɔ bɛtsɛw hɔn nkurow ho
column4: obiara a ofi mu hɔ fir no
column5: wɔbɛtsetsew no esinesin: osiandɛ hɔn mbrato ayɛ dodow

column2: "Ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na medze bɛkyɛ wo? Wo mba adan me egya
column3: na wɔakɛka hɔn a wɔnnyɛ abosom hɔn ntam: memaa wodzidzii mee no
column5: na wɔboaboaa hɔn ano ekuwekuw kɔr ndwaman efiefi mu."

column2: "Wɔtsetse dɛ mpɔnkɔnyin a wɔameemee anapa: obiara robɔ no hwen mu dzi ne nyɛnko ne yer ekyir."
"Aso mennkɛtsea hɔn wɔ ndzɛmba yinom ntsi? EWURADZE na ɔse. Aso me kra nnkedzi wer wɔ ɔman a ɔtse dɛm yi do?"
"Hom mfow n’afasu na hom nsɛɛ; mbom mma hom nnwie no korakora: hom mpempan n’abaw: osiandɛ wɔnnyɛ EWURADZE dze."
"Na Israel nye Juda mba etwa me nkontompɔ yerɛyerɛw
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Wɔapa EWURADZE na wɔase dɛ
column3: Nnyɛ ɔno bi a; eso mbusu bi nnkɛba hɛn do; eso yennkohu afona anaa ɔkɔm."

column2: "na nkɔnhyɛfo no nnyɛ hwee dɛ mframa ara
column3: osiandɛ asɛm no nnyi hɔn mu: na mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ama hɔn nye no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE
column3: dɔm Nyankopɔn no
column5: Osiandɛ hom ka dɛm asɛm yi ntsi
column7: mebɛma me nsɛm ayɛ ogya wɔ w’anomu

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: medze ɔman bi fir ekyirekyir bɛba hom do
column8: na dza wɔka so enntse ase a."

column2: "Hɔn egyen kotoku yɛ asamandan a n’ano da hɔ
column3: hɔn nyinara yɛ mbarimba akatakyi."

column2: "Na wobedzi wo ndɔbaa
column3: na w’edziban na wobedzi wo mbabanyin nye wo mbabaa: wobedzi wo nguan nye w’anantwi; wobedzi wo wenyinndua nye w’adɔmbandua: wɔdze afona bɔdwerew wo nkurow a wɔaban ho a edze wo werɛ twer no no."

column2: "Naaso nda no mu mpo
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse

column2: "Na sɛ wo nkorɔfo no se dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ayɛ hɛn dɛm ndzɛmba yinom nyina a? Ɔno na wo so se dɛ
column4: Dɛ mbrɛ hom adan me egya
column5: na wɔakɔsom anana abosom wɔ hom asaase do no
column6: dɛmara na hom bɔsom ananafo so wɔ ɔman bi a ɔnnyɛ homdze mu."

column2: "Hom nka iyi nkyerɛ Jakob fie
column3: na hom mfa ntahye wɔ Juda
column7: ɔman kwasea a wonnyi ntseasee; wɔwɔ enyiwa

column2: "Aso hom nnsuro me? EWURADZE na ɔse; aso hom ho mmpopo wɔ m’enyim? Emi a medze anhwea mabɔ po n’ano ban
column3: dɛ daa ɔhe a onntum nntra; na kaansa n’asorɛkye bu mpo a
column5: na sɛ wɔyɛ hurututuutu mpo a

column2: "Na ɔman yi dze
column3: wɔwɔ etuatsew nye mansotwe akoma; wɔatsew etua na wɔkɔ."

column2: "Eso wɔnnka wɔ hɔn akoma mu dɛ
column3: Afei wɔmma yensuro EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ɔno a ɔma nsu
column4: esusow nye ɔbɛsɛ nyina tɔ wɔ ne ber mu; na ɔkora adapɛn a wɔahyɛ ama otwaber no do ma hɛn."

column2: "Hom emumuyɛ na ɔama ndzɛmba yinom adandan
column3: na hom bɔn ama ndzepa abɔ hom."

column2: "Na wohu emumuyɛfo wɔ me man mu: wɔweɔn
column3: dɛ mbrɛ efirsuafo tsɛw; wosua efir

column2: "Tse dɛ nnoma a wɔahyɛ buw mu ma no
column3: mbrɛ nsisi ahyehyɛ hɔn efi ma ara nye no: dɛm ntsi na wɔayeyɛ akɛse na woenyinya hɔnho no."

column2: "Wɔadodɔ angoa
column3: wɔayɛ senasena: nyew
column4: wɔtra do wɔ emumuyɛ dze mu; wonndzi asɛm wɔ pɛrpɛryɛ mu
column6: ma onnwie yie; na ohianyi ne ndzinoa so wɔmmfa mma no."

column2: "Aso munnkotua hɔn iyinom ho kaw? EWURADZE na ɔse: aso me kra nnkedzi wer wɔ ɔman a ɔtse dɛm yi do?"
"Anwanwadze na adze a ɔyɛ hu aba asaase yi do;"
"nkɔnhyɛfo no hyɛ nkɔm akɔhwi mu
column3: na asɔfo nam hɔn ahodze do dzi tum; na me man so pɛ no dɛmara: na n’ewiei no hom bɛyɛ dɛn?"
